snippet: Florida has a muscular new superhero, courtesy of Marvel Comics - Captain Citrus - a made-to-order crime fighter who promotes orange juice while battling evil through the power of the sun....

headline.print_headline: Florida Orange Industry Mascot, Captain Citrus, Gets Makeover
headline.main: Florida Orange Industry Mascot, Captain Citrus, Gets Makeover

lead_paragraph: Florida has a muscular new superhero, courtesy of Marvel Comics - Captain Citrus - a made-to-order crime fighter who promotes orange juice while battling evil through the power of the sun.
